Reviews.Title: “Clean and Convenient”
Reviews.Author: eriu31
Reviews.Content: I stayed for just a night. The hotel is clean and free of offensive odors. There is a night watchman although the hotel seems to be in a a nice neighborhood; that made me feel safe. I came in late for check in, and the watchman was nice to help me find a parking spot near the lobby's entrance. As for the frontdesk clerk, he was merely laconic.There were snack vending machines right next to the elevator. The room was better than expected. My room had a wonderful view of the coast and a little balcony. Coffemaker, coffee, fridge, mugs, glasses were clean as was the bathroom. I cannot say the same for the beds, as one of them looked like it had not been changed into clean sheets, it smelled a little too; the other bed was fine. A nice amenity I must mention is the complimentary breakfast which includes food for all tastes. I was very comfortable over all.

Reviews.Title: “A convenient choice”
Reviews.Author: KeepClimbing
Reviews.Content: This hotel was a good choice simply because there is very little in the way of accommodation in the area. Beds were comfortable and the room was spacious, included a small desk, vanity with chair, and good lighting. Our room had two regular sized or full sized beds. I am uncertain if there are rooms with queen or king size beds available. Also Included in the room were a microwave and mini-fridge. The breakfast was self serve and satisfactory for us. The previous evening snacks, beer, and wine were available gratis from 17:00 to 19:00. They offer a modest US$5 senior discount but you need to ask. Good proximity to the Arecibo Observatory and the Rio Camuy Caves.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value and fabulous customer service”
Reviews.Author: missf1017
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed at this hotel for 2 nights. We travel to Puerto Rico pretty regularly, and normally stay closer to Old San Juan/metropolitan area, but we were going to a wedding in Camuy, and it was just more convenient to be close by the nights before and of the event. It was a fantastic hotel for the price - we had a fridge (NOT a minibar, an actual regular little fridge), which was great to have some cold beer available in the room for downtime and getting ready. There was also a microwave which was super handy when we wanted a light midnight snack of popcorn the night before the wedding :) The desk staff we encountered were all very friendly, super helpful and spoke both Spanish and English fluently and happily. Folks who wrote negative comments in their reviews regarding the fast food joints and the graffitied adjacent building...sounds like either a bit snobbish or just not too familiar with the island. When you're on a main strip, the abundance of fast food places is everywhere, and once you skip a few blocks down to the beach, you never even know they are there. Our room had an ocean view, and I personally thought the graffitied building off to the right added a bit of character. Bottom line, for the great service, comfort, cleanliness and convenience of the room and the very reasonable price, I'd definitely stay here again if I needed to be in this vicinity of the island. On a past trip we visited the caverns with our at the time 3 year old daughter, and I definitely would have grabbed a night in this hotel for convenience sake rather than trooping back and forth in one day in the car with a little kid.

Reviews.Title: “Beware of Noisy Banquet Hall and Unsympathetic Staff”
Reviews.Author: Phds2
Reviews.Content: We stayed here in December for two nights. We selected it for proximity to the caves and the observatory. The hotel is located on a frontage road behind a Burger King and other fast food places. Although there is a nice view of the sea from the back, there is also a graffiti-scarred building which mars the scene. It is in a tacky area. The rooms are okay and so is the breakfast. However, the main problem with this hotel is the fourth restaurant/banquet hall which is frequently used for parties. If you are any of the floors on that side of the hotel, you will not be able to sleep a wink. We saw a guy in the elevator bringing up mega speakers that afternoon. From 9 p.m. to 2 a.m., the music was so loud that our walls shook. Earplugs do not work here! We were on the third floor and party hearty revellers were even in the stairwell and down the halls, adding to the noise. The hotel's priorities are clearly with renting out their banquet hall rather than to their overnight guests. The next morning when we asked to speak to the manager, the unsympathetic and curt receptionist said, "Why do you want to speak to the manager? she already knows about it." The staff at this hotel is rigid and the customer service is poor.

Reviews.Title: “Poor service”
Reviews.Author: Peluso123
Reviews.Content: The messed up my reservation and my room was not available when I arrived. The elevator was out of service. The air conditioner was leaking water into the room flooding the room. Safe box inside the room was broken. I think the location of the hotel is very nice but next time I will pay a bit more to avoid all the above issues.

Reviews.Title: “it was good with the exception of one employee”
Reviews.Author: mema40
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel because it was close to my family. Overall the experience was good, though there was one male receptionist who seemed to not care much about the guests. Only one drink and ice machine in the whole hotel. We lost money in the machine and when my son told the guy we wanted drinks, he told my son burger king is open 24 hours. Not good service at all. Our TV was broken and the same guy told my fiance we could change rooms. REally? I was gonna change rooms at 11pm wit my 6 yr old daughter sleeping already. The rest of the staff was great thought. Angie was there the next day and we told her about what happened the night before. She apologized, gave us complimentary drinks for all of us and got our TV fixed. I would recommend this hotel but hopefully that male receptionist is not there when you go. The hotel is very quiet which I loved because you don't have the hustle and bustle of alot of people all day. We had the pool to ourselves every day. My daughter loved it. I would go back there again.

Reviews.Title: “One of the best on the north shore”
Reviews.Author: Lorenzo17
Reviews.Content: We booked this hotel when exploring the north side of the island. Check in was quick and staff were very friendly. We were impressed with the size of our room. We recommend you get a room with an ocean view. It was beautiful to see the sunset sitting on the balcony. There were huge waves on the beach which you can see from the room. Everything was neatly placed and clean. This location is a good option if you're travelling to Arecibo, Aguadilla, Rincon or any other nearby municipality. The hotel has easy access to Route 2. There are a few restaurants in the area, although the hotel also has one.

Reviews.Title: “Great small hotel”
Reviews.Author: palomaNC
Reviews.Content: WOW what a pleasant surprise this place was. Arrived a bit early, they tried to accommodate us earlier but we decided to head out to the Observatory in Arecibo. Must go and see. We had some items needed to be kept frozen they took care of it while we went scouting the towns. Spacious room, great friendly staff, great shower, excellent restaurant please try the lamb great mojitos and pina coladas. The view if you just look straight the beach waves will capture you totally. This is a place we would definitely come back to and recommend to our friends.

Reviews.Title: “Great if you're going to the countryside - Arecibo/Hatillo”
Reviews.Author: dlmyvette
Reviews.Content: I stayed at Hotel Rosa del Mar with my sister for 2 nights in April, the location of the hotel is close to Arecibo, located in Hatillo. We stayed here to be at closer proxmity to family members. This hotel itself was clean, very nice staff. They had a restaurant, but my sister and I did not have the opportunity to use it, although one of the nights there was a Boxing event and they gave us passes to go up and enjoy drinks and to watch the fight. That night there was a lot of activity, people having a good time. Close to the hotel there is a Burger King and other fast food places. If one wants to see San Juan they better have a car, it's a good hour drive AT LEAST.

Reviews.Title: “Overpriced for what it is.”
Reviews.Author: coquiOmaha
Reviews.Content: This hotel isn't worth the $160 that I paid. The room was run down with parts falling off the air conditioner. Breakfast was good and staff was nice, though. Pool closes at 6:00 which was after we checked in so we couldn't use that. This might be an OK hotel if you can get a room for $100 or so but don't pay what I did.

Reviews.Title: “Decent Rest Stop”
Reviews.Author: WorldAdventurer_7
Reviews.Content: As almost all hotels in PR are expensive during the high season, I had to limit my expectations for the price. This place was at least par for the course. The bar/restaurant at the top seemed to be pretty happening; and you get nice views of the ocean (if facing that way).

Reviews.Title: “Very good service”
Reviews.Author: srk23
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel only for a night. The receptionist Laura was extremely helpful- she accommodated all our requests. The room and the bathroom looked clean. The sheets were not that clean though. We removed the top comforter and slept with just the flat sheets on as the comforter visibly looked dirty. It would help if they updated the sheets. The room we stayed was named "mountain view" but all we saw outside the window was the back entrance/dumpster for the burger king. However, we just went to our room to stay the night and checked out the next morning. Breakfast was minimal- but you can fill yourself up. There were cereals, bread, waffles and coffee/milk. The free wifi wasn't all that great- the connection was pretty slow. We watched some TV and went to sleep. Overall, good for a comfortable stay for a night- no frills.

Reviews.Title: “The perfect beginning and ending to hectic days”
Reviews.Author: Denia109
Reviews.Content: How can I start, I was hosting a family reunion and I was stressed from the moment I arrived at the hotel. Nothing was too difficult for them. Every request I asked of them, it was tended to with the utmost respect and importance. They took care of my requests from directions to locations to faxing to late nite towel requests. I spent 9 days at the hotel and I will make it the hotel I stay in whenever I am on that part of the island. Angie, Angie, Angie, thank you for your patience and attentiveness to me and my family. Angie remembered my name and all the time there for me when I was freaking out, with a smile and a "dont worry I will take care of it" attitude. I told her that if I won the lotto, I would buy the hotel and make her the Director of management and hospitality. I wish Angie a whole lot of moving up career opportunities. Management should take care of her just to keep her there. The rooms were large bright, with a little kitchen area. The free breaksfast with avena, hummmm, was delicious. I also had an adjoining room because my mother in law came also and she liked it very much. Management should plan appropriately when the hotel is full. At times, there were no towels available when the guests needed. The restaurant was closed on some days when the hotel was completely full. There was no avena (oatmeal) on the weekends which I found odd. I would think that on the weekends you would have that. A male employee who worked at the front desk at nite, at times, did not seem to want to be there, or even care what anyone wanted or needed. I know his name but I will not say, he knows who he is. Rosa del Mar, thank you for a memorable stay

Reviews.Title: “Highly discourage staying in this Hotel”
Reviews.Author: SamRod3030
Reviews.Content: Reasons; Hotel was performing maintenance upon I check in, there was no running water, electricity went out within the first 10 minutes of checking-in(People were lock in elevator), electronic door lock was not working(I had to get the receptionist to open door a few times with Hotel Master key), the room was not fully clean/ melted bubble gum in the balcony / no towels,etc....The pools are kid's pools on top of the 4th floor. The receptionist at the time didn't even apologize for any of the issues. I stated that I was not staying in the Hotel under these conditions. He then asked for the credit card again and told me no penalty / charges were going to be added to my account. I went back 3 times to attempt to get the charges / credit back and same excuse was provided. The receptionist was not in a position to make re-imbursement / return credit, and refused every time to provide, neither the Hotel manager or supervisor contact info nor they allowed me to go to their office. Finally on the last visit, I was given the email for the supervisor, but with concern for her job Currently disputing penalty charges on credit card, after cancelling / refusing to stay in the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Delightful hotel - great stay”
Reviews.Author: AlabamaTraveler44
Reviews.Content: This little hotel is turned out to be the best of our week long visit to the island. We wanted to stay one night in the north part of the island and their website offered a special rate, which made the visit a great value. We had an oceanview room which was pristine clean and roomy with a useful tiny kitchenette (microwave, dorm fridge and sink). The decor was charming - unique and not like the chain or "corporate" hotels. We enjoyed the patio with the ocean view (okay it's a little stretch - the ocean is 3 blocks or so away - but you CAN see it). Staff was friendly and helpful, the breakfast was fine, and check-in & check-out was easy. Recommended! (Note that at the reduced promo rate wireless internet was NOT free, but Burger King is next door and all the Puerto Rico Burger Kings have free wi-fi.)

Reviews.Title: “Cute little hotel, decent for an overnight”
Reviews.Author: eschuber
Reviews.Content: We had one night without reservations in Puerto Rico and we were driving and driving west out of San Juan and were hard up for a place. It's definitely not a "destination", but if you're looking for a cute little place in the area to shack up, it's worth it. More style than a "chain" place and you can have continental breakfast overlooking the ocean about 100 meters away. Friendly staff and clean with crisp AC and cable TV.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: GrisGrisNewYork
Reviews.Content: My husband and I went on vacation to visit my family in Hatillo. We decided to stay near them and chose this hotel. The hotel was clean and not crowded perhaps due to low season. The pool is more for kids since it is 3 feet deep. The room was nice and well equiped with a mini fridge and coffee maker. The housekeeping staff kept the towels stocked. The room has a nice view of the ocean as well as the neighborhood. We didn't eat dinner at their restaurant but ate their breakfast that was complimentary ...breakfast included coffee, juice, fruit, cereals, bread and some hot cereals made local style...very good! This is a good spot to stay if you are touring the west side of the island, 45 minute drive to Isabela and about 1.5hrs to Lajas....it beats driving all the way back to San Juan. The only negative was that I could hear when guests slammed their doors upon leaving their rooms....that was just annoying but did not happen all the time. Overall this is a nice hotel.

Reviews.Title: “nice pool”
Reviews.Author: doudou97
Reviews.Content: nice hotel, nice pool, nice people. Rosa del mar is a nice place to stay. The rooms are well equiped ( microwave, fridge), and clean. The down side is the location near a busy road, but that is about it. It is fine for visiting Arecibo and the region. One last thing don't get there before check in time they will charge 50% of the price of one night (even for half an hour)!!!!

Reviews.Title: “overpriced”
Reviews.Author: cjlos
Reviews.Content: On August of 2008, I decided to book this hotel for one night. We spend one night at this place paying $168.00 for 3 adults and two kids. The hotel is overpriced. There is absolutely nothing to do on this hotel. There is no adult swimming pool. You will only find two small pools on the 4th floor of the building, one of 2â€™ and another of 3â€™.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect spot for just one night”
Reviews.Author: Lizbren
Reviews.Content: Hotel Rosa del Mar in Hatillo is a nice and clean place but definitely over price. We spend one night as this place paying $168.00 for 3 adults and two kids. The pool is a deception, you will find two pools on the 4th floor of the building, one for little kids 2â€™ and another one maybe for younger kids of 3â€™ we left the hotel and we still looking for the adults pool. I can only recommend this place for one night staying not for a weekend vacation. Is good if you are traveling around the island and you want to make a stop to take some rest.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent!!!”
Reviews.Author: llanadas
Reviews.Content: This is a great hotel! Extremely affordable (approx $120 a night). Very spacious, clean, includes breakfreast, friendly staff, great view (although a little far!). I really enjoyed this hotel and stayed there twice. I definitely recommend it!!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: travelover26
Reviews.Content: A Friend Recommended it and we loved it. My wife and me stayed for two nights after a friends wedding. Staff was great and courteous. Room was clean and very comfortable with lots of space. We travel a lot and this is the best hotel we have stayed in.Will definitely stay again and will talk to my friends about it.

Reviews.Title: “excellent”
Reviews.Author: ChicaRomeoville
Reviews.Content: I'am a manager for a marriott property. And I can say this is a very clean hotel .Great friendly staff. They have the best customer services.Our family had the best time. We fell very safe.When ever we go back to Camuy,P.R. for sure we are stay here again.Great Hotel ! ! !

Reviews.Title: “Excellent!”
Reviews.Author: Etoile983
Reviews.Content: This is a great hotel that is moderately priced, and provides a great place to stay outside San Juan. We chose to stay here before venturing from San Juan to Camuy, Arecibo, and Aguadilla. Very friendly staff, nice, updated rooms, and very quiet and clean.

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Rosa del Mar
HotelInfo.Address: Road 2 km 86.6 | Comercio St 1777, Hatillo 00659, Puerto Rico
